title: Exceptions to the world economic theory

content.question: Which of the following would complicate generalizations made from this world economy theory?

choices.label: Franceâ€™s absolute monarchy and military conquests
Strong governments in the slave-exporting regions of West Africa
The role of Dutch trading companies in Southeast Asia
The use of slaves and the plantation systems in the Americas
European import of sugar and tobacco

content.answer: Strong governments in the slave-exporting regions of West Africa

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain how claims or evidence support, modify, or refute a source's argument.
